Name: budget_respects_project_budget
Description: Total planned cost from selected work must not exceed total Project budgets

Name: sprint_capacity_respects_velocity
Description: Per-sprint assigned story points must not exceed team velocity

Name: user_story_at_most_one_sprint
Description: Each User Story is assigned to at most one Sprint

Name: task_requires_selected_story
Description: A Task can be scheduled only if its User Story is selected

Name: epic_selection_implies_stories
Description: Selecting an Epic implies (enables) selecting its User Stories

Name: feature_must_be_in_backlog
Description: A selected Feature must be contained in a Product Backlog

Name: sprint_backlog_belongs_to_sprint
Description: Every Sprint Backlog belongs to exactly one Sprint

Name: blocker_resolved_before_task_done
Description: Tasks blocked by a Blocker cannot be completed until it is resolved

Name: retrospective_moderated_by_sm
Description: Every Sprint Retrospective is moderated by a Scrum Master

Name: po_manages_one_backlog
Description: Each Product Owner manages exactly one Product Backlog

Name: team_at_most_one_project
Description: Each Team is assigned to at most one Project

Name: worker_exactly_one_team
Description: Each Worker belongs to exactly one Team

Name: task_exactly_one_sprint_if_done
Description: Each completed Task is scheduled in exactly one Sprint
